description: This Grafana dashboard uses the NVIDIA DCGM exporter to monitor GPU performance in Kubernetes clusters. Supporting both MIG and non-MIG GPUs, it provides real-time metrics on utilization, memory, temperature, power, and more, enabling efficient management of NVIDIA GPU resources.

targets.expr: sum (DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{Hostname=~"$Hostname", gpu=~"$gpu", GPU_I_PROFILE=~"$mig"}) + sum (DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_FREE{Hostname=~"$Hostname", gpu=~"$gpu", GPU_I_PROFILE=~"$mig"})
avg by(GPU_I_ID, Hostname, gpu, GPU_I_PROFILE) (DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{Hostname=~"$Hostname", gpu=~"$gpu", GPU_I_PROFILE=~"$mig"})
avg by(GPU_I_ID, Hostname, gpu, GPU_I_PROFILE) (DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{Hostname=~"$Hostname", gpu=~"$gpu", GPU_I_PROFILE=~"$mig"})
avg by(GPU_I_ID, Hostname, gpu, GPU_I_PROFILE) (DCGM_FI_PROF_GR_ENGINE_ACTIVE{Hostname=~"$Hostname", gpu=~"$gpu", GPU_I_PROFILE=~"$mig"})
avg by(GPU_I_ID, Hostname, gpu, GPU_I_PROFILE) (DCGM_FI_PROF_PIPE_TENSOR_ACTIVE{Hostname=~"$Hostname", gpu=~"$gpu", GPU_I_PROFILE=~"$mig"})
avg by(GPU_I_ID, Hostname, gpu, GPU_I_PROFILE) (DCGM_FI_PROF_DRAM_ACTIVE{Hostname=~"$Hostname", gpu=~"$gpu", GPU_I_PROFILE=~"$mig"})
count by(Hostname, gpu, GPU_I_PROFILE, GPU_I_ID, exported_namespace, exported_pod) (DCGM_FI_DEV_SM_CLOCK)

title: NVIDIA DCGM Dashboard for Kubernetes (MIG & Non-MIG GPUs)
